ExampleDefinition.Title: Secondary Y-Axes
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates a line chart with two series and primary and secondary Y-Axis. SciChart supports unlimited left and right Y-Axes and this example shows in a simple way how to register a line series on each axis
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Secondary Y-Axis</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">A static example which demonstrates a line chart with two series and primary and secondary Y-Axis. SciChart supports unlimited left and right Y-Axes and this example shows in a simple way how to register a line series on each axis.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Also see the Drag Area to Zoom, Drag Axis to Scale examples to show how to add interactivity to a dual-axis application.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontWeight="Bold" FontStyle="Italic">Tip!</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">The properties NumericAxis.AxisAlignment, NumericAxis.Id and FastLineRenderableSeries.AxisId show how to align axes and assign series to them.</Run>
